name: Fren-Z
description:
Welcome to Fren-Z:

  • Z follows your mouse, don't let him die
  • Weave through red enemies moving at random speeds
  • If hit, you become invincible for a small time
  • Collect bluies to fill up your Fren-Z Meter, which slowly fills up automatically
  • When you click, you enter Fren-Z Mode where you lose control as Z combo destroy enemies and rack up points until your meter is empty
  • The better you do, the more the game, and you, lose control.
  • Goal: Beat your high score; 10,000 unlocks special "win" Easter egg

The F key enters full screen

Escape pauses in game

Please tell me about any bugs or things you feel would make the game better/more enjoyable.
